email_text:
Subject: Your LinkedIn password has been successfully changed

Dear [Name],

This email is to confirm that the password for your LinkedIn account has been successfully changed. If you did not initiate this change, please contact us immediately at [LinkedIn customer support email or phone number] to secure your account.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. Thank you for choosing LinkedIn as your professional networking platform.

Best regards,
The LinkedIn Team
